author: Maggie Shum
title: Coronavirus may have emptied Hong Kong’s streets, but the pro-democracy protests continue
description: As the Hong Kong government cracks down on dissent, protests have moved into the courts.
content:
Of course, the outbreak of covid-19 has drastically changed the landscape for contentious politics. Hong Kongs rules on social distancing and prohibitions on group gatherings have rendered mass mobilization impossible.
Has the pro-democracy movement receded?… [+7014 chars]
